Reviews.Title: Cheep Cheep Cheap
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: These are cables on Amazon that are 100' long and include power so I picked up a few (four). They arrived, black, and with all connectors but let me tell you something-thin, weak. They're cheap little headphone wire style sheathed cable attached to BNC connectors.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff!
Reviews.Author: AERDAVID
Reviews.Content: The minute I opened the package containing the roll of coax I noticed the larger diameter compaired to the coax I received with my security system, it was nearly twice in size and I know it has to be important for not only strenth but signal carying. I am very happy and will buy this cable any time I need a replacement in the future. Thanks, AERDAVID

Reviews.Title: Looks Good,But No signal
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: I need one of 100 foot cables to install Q-See surveillance cameras on the outside of my house. The cable came with two BNC male-to-male adapters and a short (a few inches) power extension cable which I thought was a nice unexpected plus. The wires are very thin that I have to be extra careful in running the cable so as not to stress it and cause a break in the cable.After completing the installation, I had no video signal. I check every details and found that the cable had an intermittent short in the video cable next to the stress relief junction on the camera end. I decided to just repair it since I am an Electrical Engineer. After connecting the cable again, there was still no video so after another hour of troubleshooting found. I threw it as I can't waste my time any more. Please stay away from this poor quality Siamese 100 feet cable.

ProductInfo.Features:
100 foot Black Premade Siamese CCTV Cable with Power Wire
Coax Cable: 22AWG Mini-Coax with BNC Male Connectors
Power Wire: 22AWG with (1) 2.1mm x 5.5mm Female Power Jack and (1) 2.1mm x 5.5mm Male Power Plug
ProductInfo.Name: 100' Black CCTV Camera Siamese Coax Cable with Power Wire
